name: COLORS (Kyla)
description:
Objective: Collect the colored squares in the order of the rainbow. The color you need to collect next will be displayed.

To play: Press the up arrow to jump, and the left/right arrows to move left and right. When you've won, press 'R' to restart the game.

*If you can't move using the arrow keys, use your mouse to click in the game area. Then try moving again.
